title: Living tomorrow. No. 152
creator_credit: London Television Service and British Information Services
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Of all our links with the world around us, sound is probably the most persistent - providing pleasure, irritation or conveying information. Looks at some new developments in the world of sound.
